channel.title: Desolationscape Beta
channel.description:
Hi everyone, As you see im now just starting to post on mopar, Don't be to harsh.
As for my Server Development
We plan to take Davidscapes Source, Hearby use of it by david by one of our coders Zack [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2z74to9.jpg[/img] ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Premissions right there.
To use the current Source Zack is currently producing-> built off of davidscape.
To see what exactly has been currently done to show the progress that has already been done click http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,408811.0.html
In the 508 we're going to be using, we're going to go back and recode most Stat's and add some new interfaces which may include [u]The following[/u] 100% working smithing->hammer&bar to create a piece of armor 100% mining system which includes req. lvl for all rocks.&& correct ore custom mini-games not yet produced into 508's Fully working quick-chat Fix cooking a tad bit its at 90% Add Anti-syi. Figure out how and if there is a possible way to dupe. -seeing there's issue's with tokkulscape and Mezzyscape with duping Basically fully working PVP in designated wild areas only Newly Started economy where most items will be dropped by the correct npc's -besides rares which will only be released into game via drop party 100% Falador Drop party room Shops added into the correct areas And basically fix all bugs we will find.
We're going to need to beta testers for this one, -if interested please message me
(again sorry if im not allowed to include the beta tester part, if needed it can be taken out)

pix pl0x

jk XD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2010, 06:32:54 pm[/size][hr]be4 this topic gets closed for inactivity i would like to request its lock for now becuz we are going under ‘private’ development

DesolationScape is under ‘private’ development, we wont be posting in here for an extremely long time… saoo… close this till me or tyrawwrr request it open again?

Read full topic

item.title: Desolationscape Beta
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

yo we will also be needing a coding crew… if u wanna sign up PM me or tyrawwrr about it and we’ll give u the forums link to register for a coder…

what you should know if u wanna be on coding crew?

[code]
Experience on Server: a few days? just enuf?
Coding Skills: A LOT, coding multiple skills, minigames, other misc stuff

Being on the coding crew will require you to make java files from scratch or close to it? and code them so a skill or minigame or misc stuff will work to some extent…[/code]

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

hope u peeps like it

this beta is turning out ok i guess… just gotta move home and work on shops a lil bit… maybe do some other crap to the few files that need editing right now…

Read full topic

item.title: Desolationscape Beta
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi everyone, As you see im now just starting to post on mopar,
Don’t be to harsh.

As for my Server Development

We plan to take Davidscapes Source, Hearby use of it by david by one of our coders Zack

2z74to9.jpg819×188

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Premissions right there.

To use the current Source Zack is currently producing-> built off of davidscape.

To see what exactly has been currently done to show the progress that has already been done click

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

In the 508 we’re going to be using, we’re going to go back and recode most Stat’s and add some new interfaces which may include
The following
100% working smithing->hammer&bar to create a piece of armor
100% mining system which includes req. lvl for all rocks.&& correct ore
custom mini-games not yet produced into 508’s
Fully working quick-chat
Fix cooking a tad bit its at 90%
Add Anti-syi.
Figure out how and if there is a possible way to dupe.
-seeing there’s issue’s with tokkulscape and Mezzyscape with duping
Basically fully working PVP in designated wild areas only
Newly Started economy where most items will be dropped by the correct npc’s
-besides rares which will only be released into game via drop party
100% Falador Drop party room
Shops added into the correct areas
And basically fix all bugs we will find.

We’re going to need to beta testers for this one,
-if interested please message me

(again sorry if im not allowed to include the beta tester part, if needed it can be taken out)

Read full topic
